column1: ShareMicrosoft officially rolled out a new update for its Launcher app for Android.
The update introduces new features to users who have the beta program installed.

column2: beta users have the ability to get new daily backgrounds from Bing and can also create a custom set of their own.

column1: Microsoft Launcher already includes an app tray feature — which alphabetically organizes the apps you’ve recently used.

column2: Microsoft has a sign-up page to try out unreleased versions of its Microsoft Launcher app.ts Microsoft Launcher app.
